column5: This loft is just 30 minutes north of downtown Houston and is located within walking distance of countless bars, restaurants, and outdoor activitiesin the Speing/Woodlands area! Two bedrooms, king bed and twin bed, full kitchen, full bath, full living and dining rooms and a laundry room. Starbucks is our neighbor and we are willing and able chauffeurs . There are plenty of records, board games, movies, and books at your disposal and it is located just a half mile off of I-45. Children, pets, and smoking are all permitted!
